title: Why does my mom force me to wear clothing I don't like? - Quora

response.answer_text: Probably because the way you dress is inappropriate and does not cover areas which need to be covered properly. Or, she thinks your choice of colour, design and choice of style are not modern and fashionable or suited to your complexion and figure. Tastes differ. You are free to dress the way you like so long as it looks decent and graceful.

Probably because your choices are inappropriate (e.g., too short, too tight, too much cleavage showing, too hoochie/slutty, too much or you show a lack of sense of what to wear, such as pajamas in public, dirty, torn clothing to church or to a nice restaurant, etc.). Maybe she thinks you’re not dressing in a way that suits your figure and your age. Maybe she thinks that the colors and styles you choose are wrong for you and don’t flatter you.
